name: iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro is Apple's latest flagship smartphone, featuring a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and advanced camera system.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a high-end Android smartphone with a massive display, powerful Exynos processor, and versatile camera setup.

name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 6 Pro is known for its exceptional camera quality, stock Android experience, and fast performance.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: The OnePlus 9 Pro is a flagship killer with a smooth 120Hz display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and Hasselblad camera collaboration.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11
description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 is a budget-friendly flagship phone with a high-resolution display, Snapdragon 888 chipset, and a capable camera system.

name: Sony Xperia 1 III
description: The Sony Xperia 1 III is a flagship device known for its 4K OLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and excellent audio capabilities.

name: Huawei P40 Pro
description: The Huawei P40 Pro boasts a Leica camera system, powerful Kirin 990 chipset, and a large AMOLED display.

name: LG G8 ThinQ
description: The LG G8 ThinQ offers an OLED display, Snapdragon 855 processor, and advanced audio features like Crystal Sound OLED.

name: Asus ROG Phone 5
description: The Asus ROG Phone 5 is a gaming smartphone with a high-refresh-rate AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 chipset, and gaming-oriented features.

name: Motorola Moto G Power
description: The Motorola Moto G Power is known for its long-lasting battery life, clean Android experience, and affordable price point.

name: Nokia 8.3 5G
description: The Nokia 8.3 5G offers 5G connectivity, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 765G chipset, and a pure Android experience.

name: OnePlus Nord N200
description: The OnePlus Nord N200 is an affordable 5G phone with a 90Hz display, Snapdragon 480 processor, and OxygenOS software.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 10
description: The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 offers a high-resolution display, Snapdragon 678 chipset, and a versatile camera setup.

name: Oppo Find X3 Pro
description: The Oppo Find X3 Pro is a flagship device with a high-refresh-rate display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and advanced camera features.
vendor: Guangdong Oppo Mobile Telecommunications Corp., Ltd.

name: Realme 8 Pro
description: The Realme 8 Pro is a budget-friendly smartphone with a high-resolution display, Snapdragon 720G chipset, and a 108MP camera.

name: Sony Xperia 5 III
description: The Sony Xperia 5 III is a compact flagship device known for its 120Hz OLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and advanced camera capabilities.

name: Motorola Razr 5G
description: The Motorola Razr 5G is a foldable smartphone with a nostalgic design, Snapdragon 765G chipset, and innovative foldable screen technology.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra
description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra is a flagship smartphone with a massive camera bump, Snapdragon 888 chipset, and a high-quality display.

name: OnePlus 9
description: The OnePlus 9 is a mid-range flagship with a 120Hz display, Snapdragon 888 chipset, and Hasselblad camera collaboration.

name: Vivo X60 Pro
description: The Vivo X60 Pro is known for its gimbal stabilization camera, Exynos 1080 chipset, and stylish design.
